text:
The notification messages that are sent via email/internal mail should include
the action in the subject. This is easy enough to do, I'm just not sure of what
the best formatting would be for i18n purposes. Would this work with the correct
i18n calls? Or would a '-' be better than ':'?

 Lenya Notification: [publish|reject|submit] 

Currently it is just "Lenya Notification" in the local language.
